description.content:
Retrieves the rating of a product.
 ## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
(Required) Product ID.
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
(Required) Review ID.

description.content:
Retrieves a list of reviews related to a product.
## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
(Required) Returns Reviews that contain the search term in `productId`, `sku`, `shopperId`, or `reviewerName`.
(Required) Zero base starting record number, `0` is the default value.
(Required) Zero base ending record number, `3` is the default value.
(Required) Case-sensitive fieldName to order records (optionally add `:asc` or `:desc`).
(Required) Status of the review, approved (`true`) or not (`false`).
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.
Environment to use. Used as part of the URL. (This can only be one of myvtex)

response.name: OK

description.content: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.
Environment to use. Used as part of the URL. (This can only be one of myvtex)
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
(Required) Describes the type of the content being sent.
(Required) HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

description.content:
Creates multiple reviews for more than one product in a single operation.
## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.
Environment to use. Used as part of the URL. (This can only be one of myvtex)

body.raw:
[
  {
    "productId": "1",
    "rating": 4,
    "title": "test multiple reviews",
    "text": "test multiple reviews",
    "reviewerName": "Arturo",
    "approved": false,
    "verifiedPurchaser": false
  },
  {
    "productId": "2",
    "rating": 4,
    "title": "test review 2 multiple reviews",
    "text": "test review 2 multiple reviews",
    "reviewerName": "Arturo",
    "approved": false,
    "verifiedPurchaser": false
  }
]

Creates a single review. 
## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3). However you must generate and use only your `VtexidClientAutCookie` to work with this endpoint and to generate it refer to the [Generating user tokens](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-user-tokens#generating-a-user-token-with-the-vtex-io-cli) guide.
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.
Environment to use. Used as part of the URL. (This can only be one of myvtex)

description.content: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.
Environment to use. Used as part of the URL. (This can only be one of myvtex)

[Reviews & Ratings](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-reviews-and-ratings) is a VTEX IO native solution that allows shoppers to submit reviews and ratings for products, as well as see them while navigating the store. With the Reviews and Ratings API you can manage the reviews and ratings associated with the products in your store. 

 ## Index 

 ### Rating

- `GET` [Get Product Rating](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/getproductrating)

### Review

- `GET` [Get Review by Review ID](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/getreviewbyreviewid)
- `DELETE` [Delete Review](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/deletereview)
- `PATCH` [Update a Review](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/editreview)
- `GET` [Get a list of Reviews](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/getalistofreviews)
- `POST` [Create Multiple Reviews](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/savemultiplereviews)
- `DELETE` [Delete Multiple Reviews](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/deletemultiplereviews)
- `POST` [Create a Review](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/savereview)

**Servers**
- `https://{accountName}.myvtex.com/`

| **Parameter name** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------------- |
| {accountName} | Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL. | Server variable. |
